testcase.name: testAuthWithBuildingConf1
testcase.error:
403:The request is understood, but it has been refused. An accompanying error message will explain why. This code is used when requests are being denied due to update limits (https://support.twitter.com/articles/15364-about-twitter-limits-update-api-dm-and-following). message - Unable to verify your credentials code - 99
Relevant discussions can be found on the Internet at: http://www.google.co.jp/search?q=13ec0412 or http://www.google.co.jp/search?q=1597196b TwitterException{exceptionCode=[13ec0412-1597196b],
